rows.label: tlk401011_msg0001
rows.name:
We've gathered quite a bit of
information now.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0002
rows.name:
Yeah, and plenty of it blatantly bogus.
But there were some rumors in there
that did bug me a bit...

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0003
rows.name:
Time to sort out the real dirt
from the baseless suspicion.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0004
rows.name: Ooh, detective time!

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0005
rows.name:
First, we clear up basic premise.
Who is targeting summit of nations?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0006
rows.name:
Is former Chairman Bahn.
Masterpon forget already?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0007
rows.name: N-no! Tora not that stupid!

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0008
rows.name:
Is traditional for deducings to start by
listing information everybody know!

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0009
rows.name:
Proper flow is for boss to think
carefully and provide answer!

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0010
rows.name: OK, OK...

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0011
rows.name:
On to the next basic premise, then.
Where is the summit to be held?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0012
rows.name: Hmmm...

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0013
rows.name: Where is the summit being held?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0014
rows.name: The cahtedral of Acedia

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0015
rows.name: The Superbian Divine Beast battleship

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0016
rows.name: Inside the cathedral of Acedia, right?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0017
rows.name:
Uh, no, that's where we had the
LAST big meeting.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0018
rows.name:
This summit is between the leaders
of Superbia and Invidia alone. They
would hardly hold it under Acedia's nose.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0019
rows.name:
It's inside the Divine Beast battleship from
Superbia.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0020
rows.name: Yes, that's right.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0021
rows.name:
It seems like Bahn is planning an
assassination, but what method do
you think he might be using?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0022
rows.name: What's the assassination method?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0023
rows.name: Sinking the whole battleship

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0024
rows.name: Stabbing

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0025
rows.name: Poison

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0026
rows.name:
Wasn't there a rumor that he might
sink the whole Divine Beast battleship?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0027
rows.name: What?! That terrible!

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0028
rows.name:
We must get Meleph out of there
at once!

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0029
rows.name:
Hold on, hold on.
I don't remember any rumors like that.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0030
rows.name:
Actually, weren't people saying the
Superbian battleship's so tough nobody
would be able to harm it?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0031
rows.name:
Huh? Now that you mention it,
maybe that was what they said...

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0032
rows.name: Let's try this again.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0033
rows.name:
There might be a spy lurking inside,
ready to stab the target!

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0034
rows.name: Oh, Tora remember that rumor!

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0035
rows.name:
Guards say ninja spy ready to stab
Emperor and Queen at moment of
handshake! Very dramatic!

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0036
rows.name:
Hana think Masterpon been
dozing off and dreaming.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0037
rows.name:
Yes, I don't recall any rumors
of that nature.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0038
rows.name: Meh-meh-meh?!

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0039
rows.name:
Actually, didn't we hear that only a
select few trustworthy people would
be attending from both sides?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0040
rows.name:
No need to worry about ninja
spies, then.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0041
rows.name:
C'mon, Rex, at least try to think things
through before you speak.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0042
rows.name: Sorry...

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0043
rows.name: I think...the method might be poison.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0044
rows.name:
Yeah...the ship's totally secure from
the outside, and only trustworthy
people will be attending, after all.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0045
rows.name:
I guess the only method that really
leaves is tampering with the food.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0046
rows.name:
But when would the poison be added?
And to what, exactly?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0047
rows.name: What exactly will be poisoned?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0048
rows.name: The main meal at the banquet

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0049
rows.name: The drinking water for the conference

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0050
rows.name:
Maybe they'll contaminate the
drinking water at the conference?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0051
rows.name:
But did we not hear that the main
conference would only be attended
by select trustworthy individuals?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0052
rows.name:
It might be possible to contaminate
the water supply before the conference
begins, might it not?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0053
rows.name:
If it were me, I wouldn't even drink
any water at a conference like that.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0054
rows.name:
Can't be too careful around people
you don't know very well.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0055
rows.name: Is that how it works?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0056
rows.name: Maybe there's a more effective method.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0057
rows.name:
It's got to be the meal at the
banquet, right?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0058
rows.name:
Yes, I can hardly imagine the VIPs will
be preparing their own food.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0059
rows.name:
I'd quite like to see Meleph and Kagutsuchi
try cooking for a banquet...

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0060
rows.name:
And someone was saying they'd
seen lots of weird ingredients
being carried inside, right?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0061
rows.name: Indeed they were.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0062
rows.name: Suspicious big box carried inside too!

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0063
rows.name:
Could the strong-flavored ingredients
be to hide the taste of the poison?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0064
rows.name:
You're sharp, Rex.
I'd bet that's exactly what they're for.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0065
rows.name:
The only question left is, who will
be carrying out the poisoning itself?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0066
rows.name: Let's see, now...

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0067
rows.name: Who will be poisoning the food?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0068
rows.name: The refugees

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0069
rows.name: The Tirkin

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0070
rows.name: The people of Acedia

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0071
rows.name: The refugees seemed pretty angry.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0072
rows.name:
Can you blame them? It is thanks to
the conflict between Superbia and
Invidia that they have no homes.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0073
rows.name:
A summit between the two nations
will hardly amuse them.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0074
rows.name:
It's not hard to imagine Bahn taking
advantage of that resentment.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0075
rows.name:
How would the refugees get near the
banquet food to poison it, though?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0076
rows.name: Hmmm... Good point.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0077
rows.name: Could it be those Tirkin?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0078
rows.name: The ones that girl was talking about?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0079
rows.name:
Bahn use Tirkin as minions before!
Tora remember from artificial Blade
factory in Superbia!

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0080
rows.name:
I can see how they might be more
convenient for him than hiring
professional assassins, then...

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0081
rows.name:
Yeah, but you think Tirkin know
the first thing about cooking?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0082
rows.name: I don't know about that...

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0083
rows.name: Could it be the Acedian citizens?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0084
rows.name:
They certainly didn't seem happy
about the whole situation.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0085
rows.name:
Hana think they seem to not like
Superbians and Invidians very much.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0086
rows.name:
I can see where they're coming from
there, but do you really think they'd
actually try to assassinate anyone?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0087
rows.name:
The people of Acedia are not known
for desiring conflict.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0088
rows.name: Hmmm... Who could it be, then?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0089
rows.name:
Listen, I think we're just going
around in circles here.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0090
rows.name:
If we know somebody's probably
gonna poison the food, why don't we
go check out the battleship itself?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0091
rows.name:
Good point. Regardless of who's
carrying it out, we should act fast
if we're going to stop this plot.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0092
rows.name:
That settled then! Everybody go to
dining hall of Superbian battleship!
